name: PostToOffice365Connector
description: Sends a message to an Office365 connector.
author: Brett McKenzie
helpMarkDown: See here to [access the connectors for either Microsoft Teams or Office 365](https://dev.outlook.com/Connectors)

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Webhook URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connector webhook URL - [Read how to create a connector webhook](https://dev.outlook.com/Connectors).

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Title for the connector - can include [build variables](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/build/define/variables).

inputs.name: msg
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Message to echo out, you can use [Markdown Syntax](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/) if you want to do anything fancy.

inputs.name: themeColor
inputs.label: Theme Color
inputs.helpMarkDown: Puts a color next to your text, use hex codes without the hash (like E81123). **Note:** This is will not appear in Microsoft Teams.
